channel.title: [PI] Combine Key

item.title: [PI] Combine Key
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

[quote=“Sup22211, post:6, topic:517872”]So you problem is when you click combine its actually do the wield action? i hate those bugs, you need to add another action like “wield” i know you dont want to wear your key but thats the only way to make the combine to work.

If you are using one item on another you need to add to itemonitem packet

What are you saying?? iam pretty sure thats not what he want to add.[/quote]He is showing you click one item, with other items in your inventory those items delete, to make one new item.

This could be done via clickItem but I was just saying it would be more realistic to use itemonitem for this. (sort of like slayer helmet)

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Combine Key
item.dc:creator: @Nice_Boots Nice Boots
item.description:
@Nice_Boots wrote:

I just added 4 keys with the action “Combine” and whenever you click combine, the key goes to the weapon slot. I have added this is clickitem.java

if(itemId == 4184 || itemId == 4185 || itemId == 4186 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(4184, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(4185, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(4186, 1)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(4184, 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(4185, 1); c.getItems().deleteItem(4186, 1); c.getItems().addItem(4078, 1); c.sendMessage("You combine all three keys to make another key."); }

Read full topic
